title: STEM Education Design Evaluation Process Based on Information Flow

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM education design concepts and project-based learning (PBL) experience
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing mastery of quantifiable evaluation methods for practical application, combining collaborative and individual learning in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: The method for objectively evaluating STEM instructional design is explained using an information flow analysis framework
Identify three or more design flaws by applying information flow mapping tools in real-case-based projects
Quantitatively propose educational design improvements through peer and self-assessment
Create information flow visualization materials using collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace) in a BYOD environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
